name: demoblaze-e2e-playwright
description: E2E testing suite for Demoblaze website using Playwright

scripts.allure:history: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');if(fs.existsSync('allure-report/history')){fs.mkdirSync('allure-results/history',{recursive:true});fs.cpSync('allure-report/history','allure-results/history',{recursive:true});console.log('✅ History copied successfully')}else{console.log('⚠️ No history found (normal for first run)')}"
scripts.allure:generate: npm run allure:history && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:allure: npm test && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
